Message:
I take what I want,
and kill who I hate.

After doing that
countless times over,
no one was left
to oppose me.

Even if I have everything
this world has to offer,

those cold pieces of bread
I shared with everyone
are long gone...

The morning sun rises,
tinging all I can see.

With the world
engulfed in light,
everything looks as if
it had been destroyed.

If only I, too, could just
vanish from here...
